scripts.build:fresh: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.dev:fresh: pnpm run clean && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:all: pnpm run dev:infra && sleep 5 && pnpm run dev:apps
scripts.clean: rm -rf .next .turbo node_modules/.cache apps/*/.next packages/*/dist packages/*/.next && echo '✨ Cache cleaned!'
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean && rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules && echo '✨ Full clean complete! Run: pnpm install'
